name: 2022 The 5th International Conference on Image and Graphics Processing
content: Publication： 1\. Conference Proceedings All papers will be strictly double blind reviewed by the program committee, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9546-5), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. 2\. Special Issue： The conference will recommend best papers to the International Journal of Computer Applications in Technology (IJCAT) for consideration of publication in the post-conference special issue on “Advances in Image and Graphics Processing”. The extended version of the invited best papers is required to be submitted to the Inderscience online system by 10 May 2022 with article preparation based on its author guidelines. IJCAT is indexed in various major indices which include Compendex \[formerly Ei\] (Elsevier), Scopus (Elsevier), Emerging Sources Citation Index (Clarivate Analytics), Academic OneFile (Gale), and ACM Digital Library.
